checks.name: ffmpeg
checks.remediation: Install FFmpeg and ensure ffmpeg executable is available in PATH.

checks.name: demucs_cli
checks.remediation: Install demucs and ensure the demucs entrypoint is available in PATH.

checks.name: source_media
checks.remediation: Provide a valid source media file.

checks.name: pyannote_token
checks.remediation: Set PYANNOTE_AUTH_TOKEN environment variable for diarization.

checks.name: nllb_model
checks.remediation: Set VF_NLLB_CT2_PATH or place model at video_dubbing/models/nllb_ct2.

checks.name: speechbrain_runtime
checks.detail: SpeechBrain unavailable (fallback mode): module 'torchaudio' has no attribute 'list_audio_backends'
checks.remediation: Install a compatible speechbrain+torchaudio stack for model-based emotion detection.

checks.name: xtts_runtime
checks.detail: XTTS runtime unreachable: <urlopen error [WinError 10061] No connection could be made because the target machine actively refused it>
checks.remediation: Start XTTS runtime and verify VF_XTTS_RUNTIME_URL.
